Our firm specializes in all legal matters, we are available around the clock and just one phone call away.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="clamp(30px, 6vw, 60px)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true"][vc_column][vcex_grid_container columns_md="2" gap="clamp(20px, 4vmax, 40px)"][vcex_icon_box heading="Legal Contracts" wpex_padding="25px" icon_type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fas fa-handshake" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" icon_color="#000000" shadow="shadow-lg" icon_background="accent" icon_width="55px" icon_height="55px" icon_border_radius="rounded-full" icon_size="25px" heading_type="h3"]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: Contact Us

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_contact_form button_fullwidth="false" enable_privacy_check="false" labels_font_weight="normal" label_required="(required)"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]123 Demo Street
Albuquerque, NM
(123) 456-7891234[/vc_column_text][vcex_divider margin="top:20px|bottom:20px"][vc_column_text]Monday – Friday: 7AM – 5PM
Saturday: 8AM – 2PM
Sunday: Closed[/vc_column_text][vcex_divider margin="top:20px|bottom:20px"][vc_column_text]Email

item.title: Our Team
item.dc:creator: andyauthor

[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" remove_bottom_col_margin="true"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="clamp(40px, 6.5vmax, 140px)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" remove_bottom_col_margin="true" el_class="has-palette-36-background-color"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="clamp(40px, 6vw, 100px)"][vcex_heading text="Need a Lawyer?" tag="div" color="#ffffff" font_size="clamp(42px, 8vmax, 56px)"][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vc_column_text color="#ffffff" el_class="wpex-clr" align="left" width="600px" font_size="18px"]In a reck? What the heck. Contact us today for legal counsel. We are available 24/7 and can assist you in any legal matter.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_button onclick="internal_link" text_source="custom_text" color="white" internal_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Ftotal.wpexplorer.com%2Fmcgill%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us"]Contact Us[/vcex_button][vcex_spacing size="clamp(40px, 6vw, 100px)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" remove_bottom_col_margin="true"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="clamp(40px, 6vw, 100px)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="bottom"][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_heading text="McGill"][vcex_spacing size="clamp(25px, 4vw, 50px)"][vcex_flex_container justify_content="space-between" flex_wrap="true" flex_direction="row" gap="25px"][vc_column_text]123 Demo Street,
Albuquerque, NM[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]505-503-4455
